overview: College chums Ricky and Juan are having their annual indoor camp-out in Ricky's living room. Things get a bit awkward when Ricky's dad comes home with a date, the stunning Britney Amber. Ricky and Juan promise to keep the noise down, as Ricky's dad leads a bewildered Britney upstairs. Britney goes downstairs to investigate after being awoken by their moans. It's a camping trip no one will ever forget! The sexy Linzee Ryder goes into Lil Burgers hoping to get a quick meal to go. Unfortunately, she's at the mercy of horny new fry cook Ricky Spanish. When Linzee marches into the kitchen and catches Ricky red handed with her lunch down his pants, she realizes the lil humper is too full of cum to do his work right and offers to help him take care of that. Amber Jayne finds herself dealing with a real bugger of a problem in the form of a buzzing and humping Jordi!
title: Lil Humpers 12
